messages.content: What is the purpose of SRL's nodes collection?
SRL's nodes is a collection of nodes that the author finds useful for various purposes in ComfyUI.
What precaution should be taken when using SRL's nodes?
At least one module allows execution of arbitrary code, so these nodes should not be used on a system that allows untrusted users to control workflows or inputs.
What does the SRL Conditional Interrupt node do?
The SRL Conditional Interrupt node interrupts the currently running prompt if the 'interrupt' input is true. It also passes through an item of any type for sequencing purposes.
How does the SRL Format String node work?
The SRL Format String node formats a string using Python's string format syntax, allowing both positional and named argument syntax.
What is the function of SRL Eval node?
The SRL Eval node evaluates arbitrary Python code as a function. It should not be used on a system accessible by untrusted users due to security concerns.
What does the SRL Filter Image List node do?
The SRL Filter Image List node takes a list of images and a list of bools as input and outputs a list of the input images where the bool is true.
Under what license are the SRL nodes released?
All code in the SRL nodes repository is released under the AGPLv3 license unless otherwise specified.
